name: Victory Lane
description:
Victory Lane is an old-school overhead racing game against the computer inspired by arcade racing games of old.

It attempts to provide a pure gameplay experience with the minimum of fuss.

This release prototypes the overall concept and the gameplay to see if people like it or want to give feedback.

Race around four tracks and beat the three computer controlled cars - and beat your own personal best lap time!

Made with Defold

email: onesevenonegames@gmail.com
